text:
Hello Everyone :wave:

We are in the process of developing an app for the marketplace and submitted it for review two weeks ago. Initially, there was a notification indicating that "X number of apps are ahead of you. You're in the queue..." or something along those lines. However, for the past four days, I've been unable to view our progress status on our "Marketplace Listing" page in HubSpot. We seem to be stuck, as illustrated in the screenshot below. Does anyone have insights on this process?
Please check your mail. Your app may be rejected for technical/other errors. Follow the given steps which is sent on your mail id and resubmit the app.

Hi <@U03T47PSQBZ>, thank you for your prompt response. Unfortunately, I'm currently unable to access my email account and therefore have not received any emails from you. Although I am the super admin of the account, I'm not able to change the primary email. I'm really stuck in this process.
sorry mail is sent from HubSpot app verification team.
How can I reach to app verification team? Can you assist me about that issue?
